sentences: Tunnen sind juba sellest saadik, kui sa jalgu hakkasid järel vedama.
Kuiv ilm püsis augusti lõpust saadik, siis hakkas jälle sadama.
context: The word 'saadik' is a postposition in Estonian that indicates the starting point or origin, either spatially (from where) or temporally (since when). It marks the beginning of an action, state, or time period. In the context provided ('elasin'), it would indicate the starting location from which someone lived or comes from.
